1121965573460627456.text: I just had an extended argument with an anti-vaxxer. What a colossal waste of time. He had no facts, nothing to back up his opinion, and defied every scientific reference I gave him. Blocked him, of course, but it was a good demonstration of how unreasonable these people are.
